name: Timothy's Bean Romance
description:
A dating sim where you romance Timothy, the gentleman bean!

  • Date a bean!
  • Go to the mall, restaurant, or movies!
  • 3 different endings! (Including game over and secret ending!)
  • Your choices affect the outcome of the game!

Average playtime: 5-10 minutes
*This is my first game ever. If you have any advice or problems, feel leave a comment!
